snippet: The Defense Department is investigating reports that some Marines shared naked photographs of female Marines, veterans and other women on a secret Facebook page, some of which were taken without their knowledge....

headline.main: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan
headline.print_headline: North Korea Fires Four Ballistic Missiles Into Sea Near Japan

lead_paragraph: The Defense Department is investigating reports that some Marines shared naked photographs of female Marines, veterans and other women on a secret Facebook page, some of which were taken without their knowledge.
